actionTemplate.title: Color-correcting palette basics
steps: Use a brightener for center-face; use a slightly deeper shade only for soft shadow.
Use green to neutralize redness; use lavender/blue for sallowness if needed.
Use peach/salmon for dark circles; use skin-tone concealer for spots.
Optional mixes: green+concealer for redness; peach+brightener for blue/purple circles.
Warm product first; blend until no color edges remain.

rationaleTemplate: Correcting undertone makes concealer look seamless.
Warming and blending prevent patchy or over-pigmented spots.
